resources.string: Pinpon is a toy
Keep on mind before start
Avoid touching other objects around you during washing.
Have ready a towel, soap, and blotting paper ready.
Take objects off your hands and wrists.
Get your hands wet with plenty of water
Lather up and rub the palms of your hands and backhands
Rub your thumbs around them
Rub the fingertips against the palm
Rinse with plenty of water
Dry your hands with a paper towel and close the water pipe with the paper
Thanks for taking care of us all
Don\'t forget to throw away the paper towel.
Share the app to raise awareness.
Let\'s start !, Wet your hands with water, save!
lather up, rub your palms, and backpalms
surround your thumbs
rub the tips of your fingers against the palms
now rinse with lots of water
dry with a clean paper
Thanks for taking care of us all, we are done!
Start again
